channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Planning a city trip this summer? These IHG hotels will be your urban escape
item.description: Planning a summer city getaway? From luxury rooftops to beachside boutique stays, discover top IHG hotels in New York, Miami and Los Angeles.

item.title: Why you should master a few credit card transfer partners, and (most likely) leave the rest behind
item.description: If you've been overwhelmed with up to (and over) 20 transfer partner options per credit card issuer, here's how to choose a select few that will work ...

item.title: My 4 favorite things about using Hilton points to stay on an island in Venice at the Hilton Molino Stucky
item.description: I recently had the chance to stay at the Hilton Molino Stucky, Venice, a gorgeous hotel located on Giudecca Island in a restored flour mill building. ...

item.title: Southwest unveils big credit card refresh: 50% fee hikes, but new seating and boarding perks
item.description: Southwest Airlines hiked annual fees on its credit cards, but also announced a host of new benefits and other changes.

item.title: Earn Membership Rewards points with Rakuten's first-ever credit card
item.description: The new Rakuten American Express card lets you earn bonus Membership Rewards points for no annual fee. Here's everything you need to know.
